name: Nature power
description:
Dryads can grow flowers from different sources:
- In your inventory, right click a block of dirt with bone meal to grow a dandelion.
- In your inventory, right click a block of nether wart with bone meal to grow a poppy.
- In your inventory, right click a block of glowstone with bone meal to grow an orchid.
- In your inventory, right click a chorus flower with bone meal to grow an allium.
